cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Natural Resources on January 19, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 4358, Little Manatee Wild and Scenic River Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 118 (Tuesday, July 6, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. BUCHANAN:
H.R. 4358.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
To make all Laws which shall be necessary and proper for
carrying into Execution the foregoing Powers, and all other
Powers vested by this Constitution in the Government of the
United States, or in any Department or Officer thereof
[Page H3610]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

title: Little Manatee Wild and Scenic River Act
